Text:
If you want to max out your download speed, you need to edit your uTorrent settings.

Go to the Options tab in the top left hand corner of uTorrent.

On the drop down tab click on Preferences.

Under the Bandwidth tab go down to Number of Connections. Set each value for approximately 500.

Go to the BitTorrent tab and under Protocol Encryption, set it as Forced.

Speeds should average around 1.0 MB/s !
